relation: Great for these types of students
24-7 onsite campus security and local law enforcement make everyone feel at home. We also have a great student conduct team dedicated to seeing students through tough times.
If you are a high achieving student then joining Phi Theta Kappa National Honor's Society is the way to go!
Don't see a club you'd like to join? Make one! We encourage as many clubs and organizations on campus.
Any student looking for a fast paced, high energy environment should go to this school!
$99 per credit hour! What more to say about Valencia. It is so affordable that students with little to no income and attend.
GET INVOLVED! There are SO many activities every month that encourage students to get involved and have a great time. Prizes, games, giveaways and a chance to meet other students and new friends.
Valencia prides itself on providing cuisine to the students that promote a healthy lifestyle. Four restaurants make sure that every student is able to enjoy food no matter what palette.
Although the classes can be challenging, their sizes make it possible to receive personalized help from instructors.

Be persistent. As long as you are showing persistence, the staff and faculty will do all they can to help you succeed. If you are needing help, be vocal. Do not let a day go by where you feel left behind. Valencia will make sure you are not left behind.
Valencia College is a personalized school where the students matter. We are not just a number, we are a family. Coming here day after day feels like an old, comfortable shoe.
pageTitle: Valencia College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {674381=Valencia was named the number college in the nation, in the year of 2012. Instead of raising their cost of tuition like every other college or university, Valencia decided to keep their tuition affordable for students so they kept it at 99.06 per credit hour. They really care for the d]students and they offer so many programs for them, either its tutoring programs or scholarship programs they want everyone a chance to attend college and succeed., 466008=Valencia has plenty of opportunities and events that allow the student body to have fun and even help out the community. There are picnics, live bands, and fund raisers for causes such as breast cancer to cleft lips. I even had the chance to participate in a fundraiser to help victims of trafficking in April of 2011., 633278=Valencia College is my house since 2011 and it will be always. This is the place my journey started., 769802=Valencia college offers great opportunities for student success. There are always advisor on campus for any need a student may have. I graduate this december and i will transfer to UCF easily thanks to Valencia's Direct Connect to UCF program., 356967=I have been blessed with scholarships and pell grants so technically I have not paid anything out of pocket. But if I found myself having to do so I'd be paying roughly $1200.00-1400.00 per semester for a full time schedule., 703953=Valencia is a very well kept school. It was very Spacious yet cozy when it came to the one-on-one relations with students and teachers from what I saw. I really don't know that much about Valencia so far. however, what I've seen already has me anxious and excited for Spring Semester 2013., 320741=Every year on October 13Th, Valencia campuses celebrate Matador Day which is there mascot. They have tons of free food and activities available to all the students, to just have fun and enjoy being a Valencia Student, 951051=Winner of the 2012 Aspen Award and it shows. Great school, there are many different avenues for support and the class sizes are small. It is very affordable and it challenges you every step of the way., 507844=Valencia College is outstanding, which is why it won the 2011 Aspen Prize for Community College Excellence!, 557255=Valencia is simply wonderful. The winner of the Aspen Award for 2011 for Community College Excellence. I highly, highly recommend anyone going.}

textAfterTable: Endia from Tampa, FL 12/27/2009 Reviewer is Accepted here and planning to attend soon. Reviewer has been to campus. 8 out of 8 people found this review useful. 1 person found this inaccurate. 3 of 429 Categories Comments Great for these types of students Valencia is a great choice for those who want to go full time or those wanting to choose less credits per semester. Valencia allows you to work or tend to your family life while taking classes that will lead to your career goals. You choose the path and the pace. I strongly recommend Valencia Community College as the place to further your education! Tips for prospective students Choosing to further your education is the best decision you can make. Starting at Valencia then transitioning into UCF is a not only wise move, but more economical. Do your research and visit the campus and you will agree that Valencia Community College is a great school. Bang for the buck The cost of community college is what I like best.
